name: Frog Climbers
description: Climb mountains. Beat your friends. Be a douchefrog!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Very fun local multiplayer game. Highly recommended.
Hard is not hard enough give us an extreme. good game though, especially with more people.

Boring to play alone, but blast with some friends by your side.  Played with xbox 360, china xbox 360, logitech controllers, all works great.  downside, max 3 rounds per day, until it's enough for me, but come back after some time, and do all again.
